name: Boardwalk Insurance Group
overview: Boardwalk Insurance Group is a rapidly growing independent insurance agency system in our great nation presently licensed to write business in Arkansas, California, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Kansas, Louisiana, Minnesota, Missouri, New Jersey, Oklahoma, Texas & Wisconsin. Whether you are a consumer looking to inquire or purchase one or more of our amazing insurance products or if you are an insurance professional looking to take your career to the next level, you will find what you are looking for at Boardwalk Insurance Group. We have invested heavily in technology to allow our customers to communicate with us online. From our online quoting process to Customer Portal area, you will be amazed with how easy it is to do business with us. These tools allow you to do business with us on your terms and when you have time. Our customers are our top priority and for that reason, we strive to provide excellent service, fantastic rates, flexible terms and credible insurance companies. If youâ€™re looking for auto insurance, home insurance, commercial insurance, life insurance or health insurance and you reside in any of the states listed above, your search is over!
